name: Keep moving (Bardon)
description:
You are in a Dungeon. What seems to be a standard-Dungeon-Crawler is to be to have a touch of strategy. You have only a special amount of moves. When your moves are zero you are game over. But you can grab stars to add your moves. With spacebar is shooting. There are black cats, you don't have to touch them. 

There are four levels.

Control is with cursor-keys, shooting is with space-bar.
